root: ^Haha! Here I am again, Dragon! I survived your traps!
^Ha, Sir Kay, did you enjoy your trip through the Dungeon?
^Haha, of course, it was just a warm-up for me, I'm always ready to beat you up!
^Boss, be careful! Look at his armor, there's something fishy about it!
^Haha! Not bad, huh? I found this little thing at the end of the last level, I'm invincible now!
^On guard, Dragon, with this armor, I can face anything!
^Quickly, my Minion! Prepare me some explosives, a lot of explosives! We must stop him before it's too late!
^No problem, boss! Here you go! With this, we'll send him into orbit!
^My @@courage@@ won't be affected by a few sparks, Dragon!
